title: Rishi Sunak – 2021 Comments on Helping the Hospitality Industry
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 5 January 2021.
content:
The new strain of the virus presents us all with a huge challenge – and whilst the vaccine is being rolled out, we have needed to tighten restrictions further.
